new_skill_specs.name: interpret_relationship_from_text
new_skill_specs.purpose: To interpret the relationship between entities described in a text and map it to a given set of options.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The label of the correct option.
edge_cases: Options do not directly match the relationship described.

tests.input: {"text": "An increase in predators leads to a decrease in prey.", "options": [{"label": "A", "text": "decrease"}, {"label": "B", "text": "increase"}]}
